Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card during the Damage Step.
2. Tributing 2 monsters is a cost.
3. This card's effect is not applied until it resolves.
4. Sending 1 Spell Card from the Deck to the GY becomes a cost for your opponent to activate Spell Cards. If they cannot do it, they cannot activate Spell Cards.
5. If multiple copies of this card are active, your opponent will only send 1 Spell Card when they activate a Spell Card.
